availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Whitson Rector Bishop (Owen County, Kentucky, resident.)

body.p: Owen County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Fannie Young in Owen County, Kentucky, in February 1852. Father of John S. Bishop, William H. Bishop, James K. Bishop, and Norvin G. Bishop. Tenant farmer of Owen County in 1860. Farmer in Owen County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Owen County, District 2, p. 243.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Owen County, Dallasburg, p.139B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Owen County Marriages, Film 000272773.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Owen County, KY, August 1863, p. 248.
